name: Toy Pop Cubes 2
description:
Toy Pop Cubes 2 is best puzzle game .
Join game with baby girl and help collect girl toys!
HOW TO PLAY TOYS:
To play games toy you have to touch and make toy blast by two or more box of the same color to clear the level and collect the baby toys from where they stuck.
But be careful!
It is not that easy to save all the toys while your number of moving are limited!
Your talent in solving all the kids toys will help you while playing this cool toys.
